spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The red wizard evoker is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The red wizard evoker has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: School Specialization
entries: Red wizard evokers speciallize in the evocation magic school, sacrificing their ability to cast illusion and enchantment spells in the process. In exchange they gain the following benefits:
Each time the red wizard casts a 1st level or higher evocation spell it gains the benefit of being casted one level higher.
Evocation spells add the red wizard's Intelligence modifier to its damage.
The red wizard has a +1 bonus to hit and save DC of its evocation spells.

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
entries: When the red wizard evoker casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

trait.name: Empowered Spell (3/Day)
entries: When the red wizard evoker rolls damage for a spell, it can reroll up to five dice of damage. It must use the new dice.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) damage if used with both hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rezmir's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Whenever Rezmir casts a spell on a creature she is hidden from the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Tainted by the Devil
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Rezmir's darkvision, also the shadows cover her constantly giving the benefits from the {@spell mage armor} spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rezmir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Rezmir has an {@item Insignia of Claws|HotDQ}, the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} and {@item Hazirawn|HotDQ}. This weapon is magically linked to the half-dragon, so she uses her Charisma to calculate bot hit and damage with that weapon. Rezmir can, as a bonus action, summon the sword to her hand as long as they are in the same plane.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immolation
entries: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

trait.name: Split Soul
entries: A part of Rezmir's soul can manifest as a separated entity, thought which she can see and talk as if it was her {@creature rezmir's shadow|customtiamat|avatar}. That shadow acts on its own initiative and can't really die until Rezmir is destroyed, but it is 'undone' if takes enough damage.

Rezmir can use her bonus action in order to teleport the shadow or restore it in an available space 5 feet from her, the shadow can exist 100 feet from Rezmir, but in order to move further it needs to control the body of a willing {@creature black abishai|mtf|abishai}.
While this creature is active Rezmir's body casts no shadow.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 18 ({@dice 5d6}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll or a non-{@condition incapacitated} creature allied with her is 5-feet from the target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rezmir can either make two weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a weapon attack (in any order). She can also replace any weapon attack with a Caustic Bolt attack.

action.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Caustic Bolt
entries: {@atk rsp} {@hit 9}  to hit, range 90 ft, one target. Hit 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 53 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: I reject my humanity!
entries: Rezmir can take this reaction even if she has no reactions left this turn. Whenever Rezmir recieves an attack that leaves her with half her hit points or less she can equip the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} as long as it is within her items. The mask is instantly attuned to Rezmir.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: Rezmir makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: Rezmir takes the {@action Hide} action, she can then move up to 10 feet.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rezmir casts one of her at-will spells.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragonlink is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The dragonlink has the following warlock spells prepared:

trait.name: Eldritch Invocations
entries: When the dragonlink casts {@spell eldritch blast}, he adds his Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit. The dragonlink can also cast {@spell detect magic} at will and can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonlink has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonlink makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonlink has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonlink can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn

trait.name: Life Link
entries: As a bonus action, the dragonlink can choose a drake he can see at 60 feet creating a link between them. For as long as they are linked whenever the dragonlink is damaged he only recieves half the damage while the other half is dealt to the drake.

The drake's attack bonus becomes +6 and adds {@dice 1d6} elemental damage to any attack it makes. The damage type depends on the drake's color: fire for red, cold for white, poison for green, acid for black and lightning for blue.
The drake also gets a breath weapon, equivalent to the one the dragon wyrmling of the same color has.
The dragonlink can cut this link as a bonus action.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage at range if it is thrown.

headerEntries: The dragonlink is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The dragonlink has the following warlock spells prepared:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonlink has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

The drake's attack bonus becomes +6 and adds {@dice 1d6} elemental damage to any attack it makes. The damage type depends on the drake's color: fire for red, cold for white, poison for green, acid for black and lightning for blue.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage at range if it is thrown.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonwing has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonwing can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonwing ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonwing makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonwing can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonwing has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonwing's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated} .

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonwing attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage of the type to which the cultist has resistance.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragonfang's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 17 ({@dice 5d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonfang can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Elemental Synergy
entries: The dragonfang can, as a bonus action, switch its elemental damage resistance for either acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison resistance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonfang attacks twice with its shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has resistance.

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragonfang creates an energy orb between its hands and throws it to a target creature it can see at a 60 feet range. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: The Dragon's Ascension
entries: If the dragonfang is severely hurt (20 hit points or less) it can use its shortsword (or other slashing weapon) to wound its chest as part of a ritual that allows it to fill its body with magical energy before bursting into an energy explosion. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragonfang must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragonfang dies as a result.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Langdedrosa is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma(spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Langdedrosa knows the following spells:
footerEntries: Langdedrosa can use the amulet he carries on his left hand as a spellcasting focus for the spells that require material components. He also can perform somatic components even when he has weapons or a shield in one or both hands, and has advantage on Constitution saving throws that he makes to maintain his concentration on a spells.

trait.name: Improved critical
entries: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On this turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Living tempest
entries: Any lightning damage Langdedrosa deals ignores damage resistance and treats immunities as resistances.

trait.name: Aura of protection
entries: Langdedrosa and any creature he chooses within 10 feet of him gains a bonus to any saving throw equal to his Charisma modifier.

trait.name: Improved divine smite
entries: Whenever Langdedrosa hits a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra {@dice 1d8} lightning damage (already included). When he hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, he can expend one spell slot to deal lightning damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is {@dice 2d8} for a 1st-level spell slot, plus {@dice 1d8} for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of {@dice 5d8}. The damage increases by {@dice 1d8} if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of {@dice 6d8}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Langdedrosa's carries a {@item Greatsword|PHB}+2, a {@item Splint Armor|PHB}+1 and a {@item Ring of Protection|DMG}, whose modifiers have already been included on his stats.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Langdedrosa makes two attacks, either with his greatsword or spears.

action.name: Greatsword+2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. If any damage die rolls 1 or 2 Langdedrosa can reroll it once.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage in melee, or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Langdedrosa exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@dice 10d10})  lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lay on Hands
entries: Langdedrosa has a pool of 60 hit points that replenishes when he takes a long rest. He can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool. He also can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands for 5 hit points each. Has no effect on undead or constructs.
Alternatively once per short or long rest he can spend his bonus action to retrieve 8 ({@dice 1d10 + 3}) hit points.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Langdedrosa adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack from an attacker he can see, then, if the attack misses, he can make a weapon attack against the target with advantage. Langdedrosa can only use this reaction if he is wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Weapon attack
entries: Langdedrosa makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Langdedrosa makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Static Cast
entries: This action can only be used once per turn. Langdedrosa covers himself with an aura of electricity thats either provides him with 15 temporary hit points or ends a negative condition on himself, he can after that either cast an action spell or make a ranged spell attack of 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Thunder Dash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: A veil of electricity covers Langdedrosa, who flashes for a moment and moves in a straight line as if he was a lightning bolt, reappearing on an unoccupied possition no further from 30 feet. Each creature on a possition Langdedrosa went through on his movement must take a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 53 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: I reject my humanity!
entries: Rezmir can take this reaction even if she has no reactions left this turn. Whenever Rezmir recieves an attack that leaves her with half her hit points or less she can equip the {@item Black Dragon Mask|HotDQ} as long as it is within her items. The mask is instantly attuned to Rezmir.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: Rezmir makes one melee weapon attack or uses a Caustic Bolt attack. This action can't benefit from her Dark Advantage ability.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: Rezmir takes the {@action Hide} action, she can then move up to 20 feet.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Rezmir casts one of her at-will spells.

entries.name: Boss Actions
entries: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Rezmir takes a boss action to cause one of these effects, in the following order:

entries.name: Action 1
entries: Rezmir casts {@spell wall of force} using no components and tries to divide the field separating her enemies. Rezmir's {@creature rezmir's shadow|customtiamat|avatar} inmediately appears in the other side of the wall. Rezmir doesn't need to keep concentration on the spell, but killing her avatar will inmediately destroy it.

entries.name: Action 2: Reinforcements
entries: Rezmir summons two {@creature black abishai|mtf} on empty spaces within 60 feet of her. If the wall is still active she will try to protect her avatar.

entries.name: Action 3
entries: Rezmir casts {@spell greater invisibility} on herself. The spell lasts until iniciative count 20 of the next round.

entries.name: Action 4: Punish
entries: Rezmir targets an abishai she summoned or her own avatar, making the creature explode. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centred in that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entries.name: Action 5: Repeat
entries: If Rezmir is still alive she will take the 2 and 4 boss actions from this point on. Rezmir can never have more than 2 black abishai summoned with her boss actions, so if one is alive she will only summon one, or not take the action 2 if she already has two active abishai.

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Severin adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

trait.name: Arms of the Astral Self
entries: Severin fights by summoning up to six spectral arms that hover over his shoulders, giving him the appereance of a religious image. All attacks made with his Spectral Arms are considered magical. Severin can use his Charisma modifier in place of his Strength modifier when making Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

trait.name: Perfect Balance
entries: Severin can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling during the move.

trait.name: Eyes of the Future
entries: Severin sees reality as an almost endless tree of possible futures. As a result of this gift, he is always under the effect of a {@spell foresight} spell, and guides his decissions using the prophetic visions he dreams. If Severin is dealt damage he has to succeed on a concentration saving throw, or lose this skill until the beginning of his next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Severin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the Severin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Severin has the {@item Red Dragon Mask|RoTOS}, or the {@item Mask of the Dragon Queen|RoT} if he is able to make it. Severin can't gain the Draconic Majesty skill twice, and has to choose between his Legendary Resistance skill or the one granted by the mask he is attuned to.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Severin makes four attacks, choosing between his Spectral Arms and his Hellfire Orb actions.

action.name: Spectral Arms
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, Severin can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Severin's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Severin's next turn.

action.name: Hellfire Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Quivering Palm {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h} The target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage.

reaction.name: Precognition
entries: If Severin is hit by an attack or fails a saving throw he can use his reaction in order to choose a destiny path in which he doesn't. Severin ignores damage and effects dealt by the triggering action. Severin can't use this reaction if he is not under the effect of the Eyes of the Future.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: Severin reduces the bludgeoning damage he takes from a fall by 100.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Severin makes one attack with his Spectral Arms.

legendary.name: Quick Step
entries: Severin moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Enlightenment Stance
entries: Severin regains the use of his reaction, although he can only use it for his Precognition skill.

legendary.name: Hellish Chains (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Severin targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is wrapped in magical chains of fire and {@spell {@condition restrained}}. The {@spell {@condition restrained}} target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of its turns, the target can make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cyanwrath's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). Cyanwrath can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Cyanwrath exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: Cyanwrath adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack from an attacker he can see, then, if the attack misses, he can make a weapon attack against the target with advantage. Cyanwrath can only use this reaction if he is wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Weapon attack
entries: Cyanwrath makes one weapon attack without Lightning Smite.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Cyanwrath makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Static Cast
entries: Cyanwrath casts one of his innate spells, then the remaining energy generates a shield that provides him 20 temporary hit points. This action cannot be used again until Cyanwrath's next turn.

legendary.name: Thunder Dash (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: A veil of electricity covers Cyanwrath, who flashes for a moment and moves in a straight line as if he was a lightning bolt, reappearing on an unoccupied space no further from 30 feet. Each creature on a possition Cyanwrath went through on his movement must take a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragonvoice is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The dragonvoice has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonvoice makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonvoice can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Draconic Blessing
entries: Presenting his holy symbol, the dragonvoice can turn himself and an one creature he can see within 60 feet gain resistance against acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison damage, as well as advantage on saving throws against that damage type for 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragonvoice is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The dragonvoice has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonvoice can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonvoice makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 17 ({@dice 5d6}) damage

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonvoice has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonvoice's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonvoice can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Elemental Rage {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragonvoice creates three floating energy spheres, that directs against three target creatures it can see no further than 60 feet. The same creature can be objective of up to two spheres. Each sphere has one of the following properties:
Fire: the target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Ice: the target must make a {@dc 15} Strenght saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Lightning: the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reaction.name: Seek Refuge
entries: When an allied creature within 30 feet of the dragonvoice moves, the dragonvoice can move up to its speed towards that creature. All opportunity attacks provoqued by this movement are made with disadvantage.

trait.name: Equipment
entries: Any mercenary wears a {@item shield|PHB} that he can use in battle, gaining a +2 bonus to his armor class if he decides to do so. Alternatively he can combine his {@item longsword|PHB} with a {@item shortsword|PHB} or a {@item handaxe|PHB}, ussing his bonnus action to make and additional attack.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, the mercenary can take one additional action.

trait.name: Distracting Strike
entries: Once per turn, when the mercenary hits a creature with a weapon attack he can add {@dice 1d8} to the damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the mercenary has advantage if the attack is made before the start of his next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mercenary makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if the mercenary is two handing the sword.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature the mercenary can see misses an attack against him he can make a melee weapon attack against that same creature as a reaction, adding {@dice 1d8} to both the attack roll and damage roll of that attack.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The troglodyte grunt has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte grunt must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: The troglodyte grunt can spit a sticky poisonous mixture of saliva and mucus, when it does the objective is always the target's head, in order to cause blindness. This works as a regular attack with {@hit 5} to hit and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, but the target also has to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw of be {@condition blinded}. In order to get rid of this condition the target must use an action to remove the substance or succeed on the saving throw at the end of his turn.

trait.name: Chameleon Skin

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte grunt must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Poison Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: The troglodyte grunt can spit a sticky poisonous mixture of saliva and mucus, when it does the objective is always the target's head, in order to cause blindness. This works as a regular attack with {@hit 5} to hit and 6 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, but the target also has to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw of be {@condition blinded}. In order to get rid of this condition the target must use an action to remove the substance or succeed on the saving throw at the end of his turn.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shadow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shadow's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The shadow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The shadow's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the shadow can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack, provided it has advantage on the attack roll. Any {@creature black abishai|mtf|abishai} within 60-feet of the shadow gains a +2 bonus to hit with all its attacks and adds {@dice 1d6} damage to its weapon attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadow can either make two weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a weapon attack (in any order).

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Warp
entries: Whenever en enemy enters the shadow's reach it can immediately cast the {@spell misty step} spell using no components as part of this reaction.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Pharblex is a 11th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:

trait.name: Ninble Escape
entries: Pharblex can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

trait.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

trait.name: Halo of Spores
entries: Pharblex is surrounded by {@condition invisible}, necrotic spores that are harmless until he unleashes them on a creature nearby. When a creature he can see moves into a space within 10 feet of him or starts its turn there, Pharblex can use his reaction to deal {@dice 1d8} necrotic damage to that creature unless it succeeds on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 8 ({@damage 2d8}) posion damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute, the target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of his turns .

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) posion damage.

action.name: Symbiotic Entity (recharges after a short or long rest)
entries: Pharblex awakens his magical spores, gaining 44 temporary hit points for 10 minutes. While he has at least one of those points he rolls the Halo of spones' damage die twice and adds it to the total, his melee attacks also deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

legendary.name: Poison Spit
entries: Pharblex casts his {@spell poison spray} cantrip.

legendary.name: Goo Slip
entries: Pharblex uses the goo on his feet to slide across the battlefield, he can move up to his walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The psychic ooze can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The psychic ooze regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the psychic ooze takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the psychic ooze's next turn. The psychic ooze dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The psychic ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze makes three attacks with its pseudopods. It can replace one pseudopod attack with a use of Drain Intellect.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends the target is {@condition restrained}. The psychic ooze can grapple up to two medium creatures.

action.name: Drain Intellect
entries: A creature the psychic ooze is grappling must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, or transfer 2 of its intelligence points to the ooze. This action allows the ooze to also steal one skill or proficiency from its target. An affected creature can be healed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell or by destroying the original ooze.

reaction.name: Redirect
entries: When the psychic ooze is targeted by a spell that forces it to make a saving throw and then fails said saving throw, it can redirect the spell effect to another friendly ooze within 30 feet as long as there is water connecting them.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze zombie takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze zombie makes two pseudopod attacks .

action.name: Pseudopod (Longsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Entangle
entries: The psychic ooze zombie can rebuild its body in order to capture a medium or smaller creature. A target within melee range must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strenght saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition restrained}. The ooze can't take actions while it is restricting a creature, but deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage to it at the beginning of its turns. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending this effect on a success.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze zombie takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Disarm (needs Edward)
entries: Once per turn, when the psychic ooze zombie hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to add 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage to the attack, the creature then has to take a {@dc 15} Strenght saving throw or be forced to drop one item of the ooze's choice that it's holding.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze makes two pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod (Longsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Berserker {@recharge 6} (needs Nemmonis)
entries: The psychic ooze zombie makes four melee weapon attacks with advantage.

reaction.name: Riposte (needs Edward)
entries: When a creature misses the psychic ooze zombie with a melee attack, it can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the creature. If it hits, the attack adds 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to the damage roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The psychic ooze can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The psychic ooze regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the psychic ooze takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the psychic ooze's next turn. The psychic ooze dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze makes three attacks with its pseudopods. It can replace one pseudopod attack with a use of Drain Intellect.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until the grapple ends the target is {@condition restrained}. The psychic ooze can grapple up to two medium creatures.

action.name: Drain Intellect
entries: A creature the psychic ooze is grappling must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw, or transfer 2 of its intelligence points to the ooze. This action allows the ooze to also steal one skill or proficiency from its target. An affected creature can be healed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell or by destroying the original ooze.

reaction.name: Redirect
entries: When the psychic ooze is targeted by a spell that forces it to make a saving throw and then fails said saving throw, it can redirect the spell effect to another friendly ooze within 30 feet as long as there is water connecting them.

legendary.name: Summon Ooze
entries: The psychic ooze can generate 2 psychic ooze zombies of any type, as long as it has drained the right creatures. it can only use this action once until its next turn.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The psychic ooze can force a psychic ooze zombie within 60 feet to take an action outside its turn. The zombie can move up to 20 feet before acting.

legendary.name: Imitation (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The psychic ooze can take any action or bonus action a psychic ooze zombie it can produce is able to make.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The half-dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The half-dragon can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Poisoned Weapons
entries: When the half-dragon its a creature with a melee weapon attack it adds 9 ({@dice 2d8}) to the damage roll (already included).

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the half-dragon is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier (already included).

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: The half-dragon can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on its turn without falling during the move.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The half-dragon's unarmed strikes are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) posion damage. If the target is a creature, the half-dragon can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (half-dragon's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the half-dragon's next turn.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: The half-dragon can reduce fallen damage taken by 50.

reaction.name: Displacing Dodge
entries: If a melee weapon attack targeting the half-dragon misses it can use the attacker's inertia to impulse itself and jump. When this happens the half-dragon can move up to half its base speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The half-dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Brave
entries: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Persistent
entries: If the half-dragon loses a concentration saving throw it can choose to succeed instead. The half-dragon can't use this trait again until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Dance {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon performs a ritual choreography with its glaive while exhaling its breath, overcharging the weapon. The half-dragon ends this display by pointing its glaive to a creature it can see within 30 feet, directing a lightning bolt that jumps from the weapon to that target. That creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition stunned} until the end of the half-dragon's next turn and taking 33 ({@dice 6d10}) on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature wearing metallic armor has disadvantage on this saving throw.

action.name: Lihtning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Inspiring Words
entries: When a friendly creature within 60 feet of the half-dragon makes an ability check, attack roll or saving throw, it can add 4 ({@dice 1d8}) to the rolled number.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The half-dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The half-dragon can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
entries: The half-dragon deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the half-dragon that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the half-dragon doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Poisoned Weapons
entries: When the half-dragon its a creature with a melee weapon attack it adds 9 ({@dice 2d8}) to the damage roll (already included).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee weapon attacks, it can substitute any of those attacks for a Piercing Spit or a Blinding Spit.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) posion damage.

action.name: Piercing Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage. The targeted creature must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} on a failed save. If the creature was already {@condition poisoned} it becomes {@condition restrained}, if it is already {@condition restrained} by this effect it becomes {@condition paralyzed}. A creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, reverting to a previous state if it is {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}, or ending the effect  if it is {@condition poisoned} on a success.

action.name: Blinding Spit {@recharge 4}
entries: The half-dragon can throw a sticky saliva dough to a target creature's head within 5 feet. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, becoming {@condition blinded} on a failed save. An affected creature can end its blindness by taking an action to remove the spit from its face.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker the half-dragon can see hits it with an attack, it can use its reaction to halve the damage taken.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The half-dragon is an 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The half-dragon has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The half-dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Metamagic (3/Day)
entries: The half-dragon can give one of the following properties to a spell it casts:
If the spell has a casting time of 1 action, it changes the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.
If the spell forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist its effects one target of the spell gains disadvantage on its first saving throw made against the spell.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Mind Crush
entries: When the half-dragon is targeted by a melee attack by a creature it can see, it can use its magic to create a complex psychic pattern inside its foe's mind. The attacker must make a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw, or become {@condition stunned} until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Phalanx
entries: The half-dragon's reactions have advantage if it has an ally within 10 feet.

entries: The half-dragon's extensive halberd training gives him access to the following abilities:
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they enter this creature's reach.
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the {@action Disengage} action.
When a creature is hit by the half-dragon's opportunity attack its speed is becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The half-dragon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries: The half-dragon makes two halberd attacks, then a shaft attack with the opposite end of the weapon.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shaft

entries: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Sentinel
entries: When a creature within 10 feet of the half-dragon makes an attack against another target, the guard can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature if no other creature is between them.

action.name: Shield Bash

entries: The half-dragon adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the half-dragon must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Frost Weapons
entries: When the half-dragon hits a creature with a melee weapon attack it can add 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage to the damage roll (already included).

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Phalanx
entries: The half-dragon's reactions have advantage if it has an ally within 10 feet.

Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they enter this creature's reach.
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the {@action Disengage} action.
When a creature is hit by the half-dragon's opportunity attack its speed is becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Shaft
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 39 ({@damage 9d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Sentinel
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the half-dragon makes an attack against another target, the guard can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the half-dragon can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Rage (3/day)
entries: The half-dragon can enter the Rage state as a bonus action, which lasts until it is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if its turn ends and it hasn't attacked a hostile creature since its last turn or taken damage since then. During this state it gains the following modifiers:
It gains advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
Its melee weapon attacks gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.
It gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.
It can't be {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.
Its Fire Breath action deals 35 ({@dice 10d6}) damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the half-dragon is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Constitution modifier (already included).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Frightful Presence {@recharge 6}
entries: Each creature of the half-dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the half-dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Vengeance
entries: If the half-dragon takes damage and has not dealt damage to any enemy on its last turn, it can make a melee weapon attack to a creature within its reach or use its Frightful Presence if ready.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the half-dragon hits with it (already included).

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the half-dragon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Elegant Defense
entries: While not wearing armor or shields, the half-dragon adds its Charisma modifier to its armor class (already included).

trait.name: Combat Maneuvers
entries: When the half-dragon hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, except when ussing Fume Dance, it can use its bonus action to apply one of the following effects:
The target must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, on a failed save it drops an item the half-dragon chooses. It lands on the creature's feet.
The half-dragon opens the target's guard, making the next attack against that creature gain advantage. This effect lasts until the target's next turn.
The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, on a failed save it is {@condition frightened} until the end of the half-dragon's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes three melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Great Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fume Dance {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon performs a dance with its scimitar while exhaling fire from its mouth. When it does this, the half-dragon can move up to its base speed without provocking opportunity attacks, making at the same time up to three melee weapon attacks. Each target must first make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and be {@condition blinded} until the half-dragon's next turn, due to the smoke and ashes.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Smoke Screen
entries: If the half-dragon or another creature within 5 feet is targeted by an attack, the half-dragon can exhale a smoke barrier to impose dissadvantage on the attack.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, the dragon guard can take one additional action.

trait.name: Frostbite
entries: When the dragon guard hits a creature with a melee attack it can add 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage to the damage roll (already included).

trait.name: Polearm master
entries: The dragon guard's extensive training with the halberd gives him access to some special abilities. Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they enter this creature's reach, also they provoke opportunity attacks even if they take the Disengage action, and if they are hit by the dragon guard's opportunity attack their speed is becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Shaft
entries: If the dragon guard takes the attack action with its halberd it can use a bonus action in order to make an attack with the opposite end of the weapon; this attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack, dealing 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The psychic ooze zombie spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}; {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It uses its psionics to recreate the following sorcerer spells, it can innately cast requiring no components:

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze zombie takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Wild Magic
entries: Each time the psychic ooze zombie casts a level 1 or higher spell it has to roll a {@dice d20} die, on a result of 19 or 20 it has to roll an effect from the Wild Magic Surge table.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The psychic ooze zombie can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

reaction.name: Bend Luck
entries: When another creature the psychic ooze zombie can see makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it can use its reaction and spend 2 sorcery points to roll {@dice 1d4} and apply the number rolled as a bonus or penalty to the creature's roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics) (needs Bob)
headerEntries: The psychic ooze zombie spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}; +7 to hit with spell attacks). It uses its psionics to recreate the following bard spells, it can innately cast requiring no components:

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: If the psychic ooze zombie takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. This trait along with its vulnerability to fire damaged are canceled as long as it is wet.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the psychic ooze zombie deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the psychic ooze zombie that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the psychic ooze zombie doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The psychic ooze zombie can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Shadow Step (needs Slap)
entries: When the psychic ooze zombie is in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action it can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

trait.name: Sentinel (needs Slap)
entries: The psychic ooze zombie gets the benefits from the {@feat sentinel} feat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psychic ooze zombie makes two pseudopod attacks .

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Varram wears Frostbite, a magic {@item warhammer|PHB} that has the properties of a {@item weapon +2|DMG|+2 weapon} and a {@item wand of the war mage, +2|DMG|+2 wand of the war mage}. It requires attunement by an evil spellcaster.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Varram can either make two melee weapon attacks or cast a spell and make a melee weapon attack.

action.name: Frostbite (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Varram casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Frostbite
entries: Varram makes one melee weapon attack with his warhammer Frostbite.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Varram casts a spell ussing a third level or lower spell slot.

monster.name: Tiamat [NF!]

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tiamat's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Tiamat can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendaryHeader: Tiamat can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn. Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary.name: Cast a Spell
entries: Tiamat casts one of her At Will spells. This legendary action can be taken by any of her heads, but she can't take it again until the end of her next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Tiamat beats her wings. Each creature within 20 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiamat can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: School Specialization
entries: Red wizard transmuters speciallize in the transmutation magic school, sacrificing their ability to cast conjuration and enchantment spells in the process. In exchange they gain the following benefits:
Each time the red wizard casts a 1st level or higher transmutation spell it gains the benefit of being casted one level higher.
When the red wizard transmuter casts a transmutation spell of 1st level or higher, it can gain resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (but only one at a time).
The red wizard has a +1 bonus to hit and save DC of its transmutation spells.

trait.name: Shapechanger (1/Day)
entries: The red wizard transmuter can cast {@spell polymorph} on itself without expending a spell slot.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) damage if used with both hands.
