trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Magic can't put Neronvain to sleep.

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Neronvain adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Neronvain wears a {@item shortsword +2|dmg} and his robes count as a {@item leather armor +2|dmg}.

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Neronvain deals 13 ({@damage 3d8}) additional necrotic damage on each melee weapon attack (already included).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Neronvain fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Metamagic (5/Day)
entries: Whenever Neronvain casts a spell he can decide to add the effect of either the {@optfeature heightened spell|phb}, the {@optfeature subtle spell|phb} or the  {@optfeature twinned spell|phb} metamagic. If the latter is used on a 4th-level or higher spell, it consumes and additional use of this trait.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Neronvain makes three melee weapon attacks or uses his Eldritch Arrow four times.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Eldritch Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Poisonous Cloud (2/Day)
entries: Poison gas fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Neronvain can see within 50 feet of him. The gas spreads around corners and remains until the start of Neronvain's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the gas must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Neronvain magically teleports, along with any equipmenthe is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendaryHeader: Neronvain can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Neronvain regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Neronvain makes one melee weapon attack or uses his Eldritch Arrow.

legendary.name: Move Cloud
entries: Neronvain can either use his Poisonous Cloud action or move an already existing cloud he controls up to 30 feet in any direction, as long as the cloud is no further than 120 feet from him.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Neronvain uses his Teleport action.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Neronvain casts one of his Innate Spellcasting spells, or a spell he can cast using a level 3rd or lower spell slot.

monster.name: Tiamat the Goddess [NF!]

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tiamat's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Tiamat can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would leave her {@condition stunned}, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath (Red Head)
entries: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Acid Breath (Blue Head)
entries: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Cold Breath (White Head)
entries: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Blue Head)
entries: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Poison Breath (Green Head)
entries: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryHeader: Tiamat can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn. Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Tiamat makes one bite attack or one tail attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell
entries: Tiamat casts one of her At Will spells. This legendary action can be taken by any of her heads, but she can't take it again until the end of her next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Tiamat beats her wings. Each creature within 20 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Tiamat can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Breath Weapon (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat uses one or her breath weapon attacks. Tiamat can't use a breath weapon if it has already been used as an action on her last turn or if the associated head has already taken a legendary action.

entries.name: Boss Actions
entries: At the begining of each round, before any turn is taken, Tiamat takes a boss action to cause one of these effects, in the following order:

entries.name: Action 1: Hell Fire
entries: Tiamat's red dragon head roars, and until her next boss action a 200 feet radius centered on her is distorted into a burning cracked ruin, with 20-feet high flames. Each other creature or flammable object that enters this area or begins its turn on it takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage and ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire (or extinguish it by other means such as Tiamat's cold breath), the creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

Tiamat also chooses up to four 20-feet radius spheres inside the inflamed area, which begin to crack and glow suspiciously. At the end of the current round those areas explode, and each creature within them must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage and 70 ({@damage 20d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entries.name: Action 2: Frozen Armor
entries: Tiamat's white head roars, and when she does a burst of ice explodes from her body. Until Tiamat's next boss action her body is covered with dense ice plates that protect her from damage, giving her 100 temporary hit points. Tiamat can't fly while she has these temporary hit points, nor use her fire breath.

This ice armor starts glowing and shaking the more damage it takes. At the end of the current round or when Tiamat loses all her temporary hit points the armor explodes, and each creature within 20 feet of Tiamat's body must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entries.name: Action 3: Devouring Mist
entries: Tiamat's black head wraps her body in a thick acid cloud. Until Tiamat's next boss action her body is considered to be in magical darkness. Any other creature that starts its turn at 10 feet or closer to Tiamat takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage and any weapon or armor it is wearing corrodes taking a -3 (-1 if it is magical) penalty to its AC, attack modifier and damage. Armor reduced to an AC of 10, a shield that drops to a +0 bonus or a weapon that reaches a -3 to hit modifier is destroyed.

entries.name: Action 4: Divide Self
entries: Tiamat's green head creates three perfect illusions of herself, and then she can move up to 60 feet in any direction. These illusions move as a free action each time Tiamat does and also mimic each of her actions. Each time Tiamat is targeted by an attack or spell there is a 75 percent chance (3 copies), 66 percent chance (2 copies), or a 50 percent chance (1 copy) to be one or her copies instead. Each copy has 20 hit points it has to lose before being destroyed, but they will also be dispelled as soon as Tiamat takes her next boss action.

entries.name: Action 5: Distort Time
entries: Tiamat's blue head pronounces words in an eldritch forgotten language, creating a 200 feet radius bubble in reality where time bends to her will until her next boss action. Each other creature that enters this area or begins its turn on it is automatically under the effect of a {@spell slow} spell, while Tiamat is under the effect of a {@spell haste} spell. Tiamat suffers no negative effect when the {@spell haste} spell finishes.

entries.name: Action 6: Repeat
entries: If Tiamat is still alive she will take any of the previous boss actions from this point on. She can't take the same boss action two times in a row.

entries: a

legendary.name: Bite

legendary.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The red wizard evoker is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The red wizard evoker has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: School Specialization
entries: Red wizard abjurers specialize in the abjuration magic school, sacrificing their ability to cast evocation and transmutation spells in the process. In exchange they gain the following benefits:
Each time the red wizard casts a 1st level or higher abjuration spell it gains the benefit of being cast one level higher.

When the red wizard casts an abjuration spell that requires him to make an ability check as a part of casting that spell (as in {@spell counterspell} and {@spell dispel magic}), he adds his proficiency bonus to that ability check and has advantage on that roll.
The red wizard has a +1 bonus to hit and save DC of its abjuration spells.

trait.name: Spell Resistance
entries: The red wizard has advantage on saving throws against spells and resistance against the damage of spells.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) damage if used with both hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fire giant pyromancer's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The pyromancer deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Tackle
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Heart of Fire
entries: Whenever the fire giant pyromancer starts casting one of its innate spells that deals fire damage, fiery magic erupts from it. This eruption causes creatures within 10 feet of it to take 10 fire damage.

trait.name: Fire in the Veins
entries: While the fire giant pyromancer has 100 or less hit points it ignores resistance to fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fire giant pyromancer makes one melee weapon attack and then casts one of its at-will spells.

action.name: Fire Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The fire giant champion deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Tackle
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fire giant champion makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 5d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The death giant is a 19th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless the death giant is {@condition incapacitated}, it and undead creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death giant makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Logsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 23 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
entries: The death giant hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: The death giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death giant adds 6 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the death knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the storm giant zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the storm giant zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant zombie makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the storm giant zombie can't use the same hand to attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} creature {@condition grappled} by the storm giant zombie. {@h}The target takes 42 ({@damage 6d10 + 9}) piercing damage and then that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the storm giant zombie, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the giant's turns.

If the storm giant zombie takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, a breach opens in its abdomen and the creature is expulsed, falling {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet oft the giant. If the giant is destroyed, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Necrotic Lightning Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant explodes in a magical lighting storm. Each creature within 10 feet of the giant must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage and 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
